update user

NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

EXPIRED_TIME = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HEAD_PIC = #{headPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
